summary: A meek pharmacist creates an alternate identity under which he plans to murder the bullying liquor salesman who has become his wife's lover.
cast: Richard Basehart|Audrey Totter|Cyd Charisse|Barry Sullivan|Lloyd Gough|Tom D'Andrea|William Conrad|Tito Renaldo|Ray Bennett|Virginia Brissac|Peter Brocco|Steve Carruthers|Bert Davidson|John Gallaudet|Theresa Harris|John Indrisano|George Magrill|Kitty McHugh|Mike Morelli|Stephen Roberts|Carl Sklover|Hayward Soo Hoo|Arthur Tovey|Philip Van Zandt|Tommy Walker
title: Tension
